mapper.select: SELECT tp.*, f.no AS fileNo, u.id AS userId, u.name AS userName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users u_sub WHERE u_sub.trainer_no = tp.trainer_no) AS userCount FROM trainer_profile tp JOIN files f ON tp.no = f.profile_no LEFT JOIN users u ON u.no = tp.trainer_no WHERE tp.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{page.index}, #{page.rows}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trainer_profile tp JOIN files f ON tp.no = f.profile_no LEFT JOIN users u ON u.no = tp.trainer_no WHERE tp.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT tp.*, f.no AS fileNo FROM trainer_profile tp JOIN files f ON tp.no = f.profile_no WHERE tp.no = #{trainerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainer_profile ( trainer_no, name, simple_info, detail_info ) VALUES ( #{trainerNo}, #{name}, #{simpleInfo}, #{detailInfo} )
mapper.select: SELECT trainer_no, COUNT(*) AS count FROM buy_list WHERE trainer_no = #{trainerNo} GROUP BY trainer_no

SELECT u.no, u.name, u.id, MAX(tp.name) AS trainerName -- 중복 제거 시 첫 번째 trainerName FROM users u JOIN user_auth a ON u.no = a.user_no LEFT JOIN trainer_profile tp ON tp.trainer_no = u.no WHERE a.auth = 'ROLE_TRAINER' GROUP BY u.name, u.no, u.id
SELECT tp.*, u.no AS userNo FROM users u JOIN trainer_profile tp ON u.trainer_no = tp.trainer_no WHERE tp.trainer_no = #{trainerNo} GROUP BY tp.no, u.no LIMIT 1
